duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead nursing practice using the Professional Practice Model and Care Delivery Model for patient experience promotion.
Facilitate patient care, quality, safety, and operational efficiency through administrative and clinical oversight.
Support implementation of the department's mission, vision, goals, and objectives across clinical service and patient care units.
Provide mentorship, coaching, counseling, and disciplinary actions to nursing staff as needed.
Foster an environment of care that reflects clinical excellence and ethical decision-making for patients and their families.
Acquire and disseminate knowledge and skills relative to the role, patient population, clinical specialty, and community needs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science with a major in nursing required; Masters in nursing or health related field preferred.
